wikipedia_page.main: Taylor Jasmine Hinds (born 25 April 1999) is an English footballer who plays as a fullback or midfielder for Liverpool of the FA Women's Championship. She has represented England on the under-17 and under-19 national teams.

response: In January 2018, Kelly made a permanent transfer to Everton on contract through summer 2020, alongside Arsenal teammate Taylor Hinds. She made a total of 15 appearances for Everton during the 2017-18 FA WSL season and scored two goals. Everton finished in ninth place with a  record. During the 2018-19 FA WSL season, Kelly made eleven appearances and scored a goal during the team's 3–3 draw against Brighton & Hove Albion despite playing on an ankle injury throughout the season. Everton finished in 10th place.
